title: New: Westerman – Roads
body:
Adore the songwriting on this track from London’s **Westerman**.

Reminds me a little of Ben Howard’s terrific second album, in the intimacy and fragility of the sound, there’s a truly distinguished beauty to it. Check out _Roads_ below.

excerpt.full: Adore the songwriting on this track from London’s Westerman. Reminds me a little of Ben Howard’s terrific second album, in the intimacy and fragility of the sound, there’s a truly distinguished beauty to it. Check out Roads below.
excerpt.short: Adore the songwriting on this track from London's Westerman.
